title: utybbas2
author: utybbas2
created_time: November 20, 2023, 12:01:48 AMLast edit: November 20, 2023, 05:22:34 PM by utybbas2
content: hiring 2 people for online freelance work, related with design and data entry, copy and paste and images gathering in bing, 10-12 days,payment after 2 hour of work, btc or ether.contact telegram = @Daniyug1

comments.author: pinggoki
comments.body: There is a current problem right now with people asking for services and not paying for the work so allow me to tell you that you will have a hard time finding a person for the job unless you are alright with the use of escrow for the funds that you are going to pay for the service.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: I have two concerns regarding this job ad,Firstly,  is this your direct job or you have someone that needs the hires.Secondly, Do you agree to escrow the funds for this job or pay upfront as we can't afford to have multiple complaints about people working and not getting paid. Loads of those kind of complaints have been noticed around the forum lately.

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: Another scam. Why did you delete/edit your old topic?Topic link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5451887.msg62211374#msg62211374before edit link: https://ninjastic.space/post/62211374content:QuoteNeed 2 people to help me in web slides design and some slide graphic worksheet,you will Not need to write/draw, or do anything artistic,just  keep things organized for me, payment each day in Eth or bitcoin, please contact if interested, forum or telegram: Ubbyybrad4,I may take a couple of minutes to respond due to problems with my connection but soon to be fixed. thanks.Why did you change your previous telegram ID?by using your old telegram ID, Google gave me a search result connected to another account, but it appears that the post has been deleted.Unless you used escrow, I do not advise anyone to deal with this account.

comments.author: CCMS
comments.body: Quote from: Yamane_Keto on November 20, 2023, 04:01:09 AMAnother scam. Why did you delete/edit your old topic?Topic link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5451887.msg62211374#msg62211374before edit link: https://ninjastic.space/post/62211374content:Unless you used escrow, I do not advise anyone to deal with this account.Good catch there . I hope OP has answers to above questions .

comments.author: utybbas2
comments.body: I bought telegram accounts cause I cannot create them in my country, I can deal in discord or in the forum even if more slow if prefer, I always pay. sorry for the inconvenience of old telegrams

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: Quote from: utybbas2 on November 20, 2023, 12:42:14 PMI bought telegram accounts cause I cannot create them in my country, I can deal in discord or in the forum even if more slow if prefer, I always pay. sorry for the inconvenience of old telegramsYou made me laugh, you found 10 people in such a short time, let's hope you can pay them. The problem does not lie in how you communicate, but in your attempt to hide things. If you put money in escrow, you will inevitably find everyone involved.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: How on earth do you intend to work with 10 accounts you bought?Let me guess, you want to have to raid or shill at the same time. Its not easy managing two to three accounts, how much more 10 of it. I wish you all the luck you can get but it'll be more ideal to spread the job across people (that's if the job is real and ideal) else it will overwhelm you at some point in time.And always seek some contributions from the forum as more people might be into it same job you want to adventure into.
